091-36a @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /Ar+ya badzra b+hair ba d+hA ra NI nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma sel ba/ mtha' yas pa/ mu thug pa med pa/ dam pa sbyin pa/ shin tu rgya che ba/ thams cad bdag la mthun par rtag tu mtha' yas pa'i dam pa'i mchog stsol bar gyur cig /de la nga'i rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag go/ /a ra ra/ a sa ma/ sa ma tA/ a nan+ta d+har+m+ma tre/ kha NA kha NA/ ma hA bi re/ tsa le sa ma ma/ A sa hA/ ma hA ba le/ ka Na ka Na/ ma hA ba la/ A gri he/ ha ha badzrA/ badzra hA ye/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hU~M hU~M maN+Da la/ sa ma pa ra a kra bi kra me/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sarba thA/ sarba hi/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ a kri Ni phaT swA hA/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan stong bzlas brjod byas na/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags thams cad lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas par 'gyur ro/ /las gzhan thams cad kyang don yod cing thogs pa med par byed de/ dam tshig gsum pa'i cho ga las 'byung ba'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / gzungs thams cad kyi nang na las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /de nas cho ga mi bzad pa/ /rdo rje gtams pa 'dra ba ni/ /klu dang lha srin bcas pa yi/ /sum cu gsum lhas mi shigs pa/ /de khros pas ni lhas mchod pa'i/ /brgya byin nyid kyang 'dar bar 'gyur/ /'byung po kun gyis ma smad pa/ /de ni bsrung bar byed pa'i mchog /ji ltar lhar bcas 'jig rten na/ /sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de yis ni/ /skye bo kun la srung gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ oM badzra prA kA ra/ badzra prA kA ra/ badzra daM Sh+TA/ b+ha yA b+ha hA/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pa ri tsu ma bi ke/ /tsu lu te le/ na mo rat+na trA yA ya/ na mo badzra b+hai ra ba s+ya/

72
091-36b ma hA ga Na pa ti s+ya/ badzra shak+ti/ par shu/ pA sha /hastA ya/ badzra kan ka /badzra bai DUr+ya/ a lang kr-i ta/ sha rI rA ya/ badzra pA Ni ra nu pA lA ya/ tad+ya thA/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ A na yA/ A na yA/ ma hA ga na pa ti la g+hu la g+hu/ e hi e hi/ A kra ma A kra ma/ sha rI raM/ gr-i hI ta ma/ graM hI ta ma/ daMSh+TA mA/ daM Sh+T+rI mA bA/ at+t+ra bi sha tu sha rI raM kiny+tsi rA ya si/ bi d+hu na/ ba d+ha na/ pa Ta pa Ta/ kaM pa kaM pa/ raM ga raM ga /mo da mo da/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ bi dzr-i ma bA/ bi dzr-i ma bA/ pU ra pU ra/ g+hU r+N+Na g+hU r+N+Na/ A bi sha / A bi sha/ shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/ ma hA badzra b+hai ra b+he/ ga na pa ti rAdz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ cho ga la dgra thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / byad stems thams cad gcad pa la ni ba'i lci ba la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ sems khros pas mtshon cha la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ sa la btsugs na de ma thag tu byad stems thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzlog par 'dod pas ni dbyug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ de phyogs su 'phangs na dgra thams cad myos par 'gyur ro/ /klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na khros te rdo rje la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ bsnun na klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /ser ba bzlog par 'dod pas ni rdo rje ha cang mi drag par bskor zhing sgra yang ha cang gsang mi mtho bar brjod na/ klu rnams ser ba mi 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /chang bsrung bar 'dod pas ni chang gi rdzas rnams yungs kar la lan bdun bsngags na thub par 'gyur ro/ /nad zhi bar 'dod pa la ni nad dang mthun pa'i sman rnams chu la lan bdun bsngags te 'thungs sam byugs na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /las gang byed pa thams cad la'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na bsams pa de grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba/ ma rungs pa phyir bzlog pa rdzogs so// //'phags pas gsungs pa'i gzungs rnams rnam mang yang / /rdo rje 'jigs

73
091-37a byed zhal nas gsungs pa'i gzungs/ /bsrung bya'i las bdun ldan pa'i gzungs mchog 'di/ /kun gyi thun mong ma yin rnam 'byor dam pa'i gzungs/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur nas/ bod kyi ban+de skyo 'od 'byung la gnang ngo //
